title: Germany’s Niklas Behrens Blazes to U23 Gold, Del Toro, Blackmore Fade Late
content:
No US racers figure in U23 chase for rainbow jersey, while pre-race favorites Del Toro and Blackmore were gapped late in attritional race.

Read the full article at Germany’s Niklas Behrens Blazes to U23 Gold, Del Toro, Blackmore Fade Late on Velo.
author: ahood
